alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 1:59PM MST until December 24 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Rain and snow showers above 6500 feet, all snow above 7000 feet. Snow showers may become heavy at times again this afternoon. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches above 7000 feet, with locally higher totals above 7500-8000 feet. Southwest winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 7000 feet near Flagstaff and Forest Lakes. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times. Areas of blowing snow could reduce visibility. Snow bands may impact the evening commute. Additional snow forecast from 1 PM Today to 5 PM Today: Flagstaff 0 to 1 inches Forest Lakes 0 to 1 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim
